c74object.name: rs.file2sig~
c74object.digest: Converts arbitrary binary data into telecommunication control signals.
c74object.description: rs.file2sig~ by Reilly Spitzfaden can import any file as raw binary data and play this data back as a control signal for synthesizing PSK (phase-shift keying)/ASK/FSK/etc. telecommunications signals.

inlet.description: Signal input: a single sample click advances the output to the next bit in the source file

objarg.name: file
objarg.description: Name of the file to be imported

method.name: read
method.description: "read" followed by a file name opens that file; "read" alone opens the file picker window.

attribute.name: polarity
attribute.description: Set the control signal to bipolar (-1–1) or unipolar (0–1) range: 0 (bipolar, default), 1 (unipolar)
